Note: These SVG logos are modern, tech-focused designs for the VibeSurf AI browser extension. For best Chrome extension compatibility, convert to PNG format using:

• ImageMagick: brew install imagemagick
• rsvg-convert: brew install librsvg
• Online converter: Use any SVG to PNG converter website

The current manifest.json uses the Neural Network logo by default.
